question:
A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.


Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,•	explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday•	describe some possible disadvantages•	say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: Hope you and your family doing amazing. This letter is written to you to inform you that this holiday  I decided to take part in a camp and it will be my very first time leaving home alone.

The camp will be at Dewan Sri Pinang for 3 days 2 nights besides that  is a music camp .I was very excited as you know I'm an introverted person but I think I can learn a lot of music skills and make some new friendships that have the same hobby as mine.

although they must be a few disadvantages ,First of all, I heard the place sleeping was very small and ditty  secondly, that we need to share nine-bathroom with hundreds of campers but I think I can solve this problem .at  last , I will hope you could join me so please feel free to contact me.
Can't wait to meet you and do camping with you.All the best,
